name: As the world cave in
description:
This is a mini FPS demo for a Unity Bootcamp class.

Features:

  • FPS Control
  • Shoot, reload, and aim
  • Zombie AI and enemy pool management 
  • Item pickup
  • Day and night cycle (24mins)
  • Basic UI

Control

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Run: Holding Shift
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Aim: Holding Right Mouse Button
  • Reload: R
  • Pick up item: E
  • Toggle flashlight: F
